video.title: Sherlock
video.synopsis: In this updated take on Arthur Conan Doyle's beloved mystery tales, the eccentric sleuth prowls the streets of modern-day London in search of clues.

episodes.synopsis: A woman in pink is the fourth in a series of seemingly unrelated suicides, but Sherlock Holmes deduces that the deaths are actually murders most foul.
episodes.title: A Study in Pink

episodes.synopsis: Watson's new life with flatmate Sherlock Holmes is never dull, and even Sherlock's unusual idea of a visit to the bank keeps the doctor on his toes.
episodes.title: The Blind Banker

episodes.synopsis: Despairing of the ingenuity of London's criminals, Sherlock accepts what appears to be an ordinary case and discovers that a mastermind is at work.
episodes.title: The Great Game

episodes.synopsis: A royal scandal brings Sherlock into a tough duel of wits.
episodes.title: A Scandal in Belgravia

episodes.synopsis: Sherlock travels to Dartmoor to unravel the mystery of a hound from hell.
episodes.title: The Hounds of Baskerville

episodes.synopsis: Sherlock goes into battle with Moriarty, his greatest adversary.
episodes.title: The Reichenbach Fall

episodes.synopsis: Two years after Sherlock's "death," Watson has moved on. But when London is threatened by a terrorist attack, Sherlock decides it's time to return.
episodes.title: The Empty Hearse

episodes.synopsis: While mortal danger stalks Watson's wedding reception, Sherlock faces his biggest challenge of all: delivering a best man's speech!
episodes.title: The Sign of Three

episodes.synopsis: A case of stolen letters leads Sherlock Holmes to engage in a long conflict with the powerful Charles Augustus Magnussen, the Napoleon of blackmail.
episodes.title: His Last Vow

episodes.synopsis: This look behind the scenes at the hit series features a reunion of the cast as they hold a read-through of the first episode of Series 3.
episodes.title: Sherlock Uncovered: The Return

episodes.synopsis: Cast members both male and female discuss the famous sleuth's relationship with women both on the page and in the hit series.
episodes.title: Sherlock Uncovered: The Women

episodes.synopsis: Revisit the rogues' gallery of villains who've haunted Sherlock Holmes -- and his inner circle -- over the course of the hit series.
episodes.title: Sherlock Uncovered: The Villains
